content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 a simple and pretty pair of fingerless gloves featuring a soft wavy lace pattern inspired by old shale worked flat from the bottom up these gloves use basic increases and decreases making them a great introduction to lace knitting the pattern includes a stretchy 2x2 rib cuff gentle lace repeat and easy seaming to create a comfortable fit for most adult hands designed in aran weight yarn they knit up quickly and pair beautifully with gradual ombré or lightly variegated shades perfect for gifting or completing a matching set with the shetland lace scarf and beanie
